Description:
Detects the creation of the file "rootlog" which is used by the TripleCross rootkit as a way to check if the backdoor is already running.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Triple Cross eBPF Rootkit Default LockFile
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where filepath = '/tmp/rootlog'
